TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PaperSource extends System.Object

Docs.summary: 指定给打印机送纸的纸盒。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此类由<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSources%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PaperSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性以获取本文源可用在打印机上并分别设置页上，纸张来源的盘子。
打印有关的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Drawing.Printing>命名空间概述。
## Examples 下面的代码示例填充`comboPaperSource`支持的组合框与打印机纸张来源。 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.SourceName%2A>被标识为提供有关通过将要添加的项的显示字符串的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>属性的组合框。 该示例需要<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>变量名为`printDoc`存在以及是否存在特定的组合框。
[!code-cpp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/VB/source.vb#2)]

Docs.summary: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 下表显示 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource> 类的实例的初始属性值。
|Property|初始值| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.Kind%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Custom?displayProperty=nameWithType>| |<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.SourceName%2A>|<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>|

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Kind As PaperSourceKind
public: property int RawKind { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: 获取或设置表示 值之一或自定义值的整数。
Docs.value: 表示 值之一或自定义值的整数值。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 下表显示每个整数值<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind>成员。 任何大于 256 映射到<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Custom>中<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind>枚举，但<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.RawKind%2A>属性返回的实际整数值。
|整数值|PaperSourceKind 成员| |-------------------|----------------------------| |1|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Upper>| |2|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Lower>| |3|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Middle>| |4|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Manual>| |5|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Envelope>| |6|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.ManualFeed>| |7|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.AutomaticFeed>| |8|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.TractorFeed>| |9|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.SmallFormat>| |10|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.LargeFormat>| |11|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.LargeCapacity>| |14|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Cassette>| |15|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.FormSource>| |256 或更大|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Custom>|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SourceName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: 获取或设置纸张来源的名称。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 当需要显示纸张来源时，请调用此属性。 纸张源的名称生成基于<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.Kind%2A>属性。
## Examples 下面的代码示例填充`comboPaperSource`支持的组合框与打印机纸张来源。 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.SourceName%2A>被标识为提供有关通过将要添加的项的显示字符串的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>属性的组合框。 该示例需要<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>变量名为`printDoc`存在以及是否存在特定的组合框。
[!code-cpp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/VB/source.vb#2)]
